titleInfo.title: 'History of the imâms and seyyids of 'Omân by Salîl-ibn-Razîk, from A.D. 661-1856; translated from the original Arabic, and edited with notes, appendices, and an introduction, continuing the history down to 1870, by George Percy Badger, F.R.G.S., late chaplain in the Presidency of Bombay.'

physicalDescription.extent: The volume contains a table of contents giving chapter headings and page references. There is an index to the principal names at the back of the volume.

mods.abstract: History of the imâms and seyyids of 'Omân by Salîl-ibn-Razîk, from A.D. 661-1856; translated from the original Arabic, and edited with notes, appendices, and an introduction, continuing the history down to 1870, by George Percy Badger, F.R.G.S., late chaplain in the Presidency of Bombay.Author: Hamid ibn Muhammad ibn RuzayqPublication details: London: Printed for the Hakluyt SocietyPhysical Description: initial roman numeral pagination (i-cxxviii); with map.
